Hi <@UHA0L28CW>
Here in the comment about <@UKHNRHVC7> explained it might be something on their end in case of such errors. Probably, it’s best to DM him your HubSpot ID to check if it’s a case
The validator on the new marketplace submission is not working. I've retried it for like 6 hours.

I'm so sorry it has been a while since I logged in here. I am hoping my feedback is still warranted.  There are a few key use cases we have for QR Codes as follows:
1. Print Ads - we want to be able to track which Ad the QR code was scanned from

1. ...
2. Tradeshows: We want users to be able to scan a QR code to watch videos and access other more in-depth product details that we cannot show in person (the products deal with radiography and x-rays so we can't exactly fire them up at the tradeshow).
